radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple solid opacities in the right lower lobe; small subcentimeter solid opacities localized to an area measuring 4.5 cm; no pleural effusion. Distended gallbladder with thickened wall; small fluid collections surrounding the gallbladder, concerning for perforation; large gallstone at the gallbladder neck; small amount of pericholecystic fluid tracking down into the pelvis. Inflamed loop of jejunum likely secondary to adjacent findings.
